name: Twitch Flat Dark & Clean
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Flat Dark & Clean skin for Twitch. Works well with FFZ. Works fine with BTTV.

user.name: Martinius Ulberg
user.about: Feel free to use any of my code for remixes! As I get better I also get more organized and work hard to make my code easy to understand and modify.

additional_info:
v.0.2 Recoded. Super basic now.
v.0.1.5 Added support for clips.twitch.tv

discussions.name: Fix the Flat style so it works with the new Twitch interface and dark mode
